info.title: MCPC One Agent Priority API
info.description: This API allows Collab to request priority instructions from a caller and a receiver number

get.summary: Gets a priority from a caller and a receiver

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The receiver number (optional). If no receiver is sent, a generic priority will be returned instead of the one that is set for the service.

priority.description: The priority for the given call. A lower number means a higher priority [eg 1 has more priority then 5)
